basic.Peptide Name: PGLa (chain of PYLa/PGLa A; Frogs, amphibians, animals)
basic.Target Organism: Gram-negative bacteria:Escherichia coli 25922 (MIC=62-125 µg/ml), Klebsiella pneumoniae 13883 (MIC=250-500 µg/ml), Pseudomonas aeruginosa 27853 (MIC=250-500 µg/ml);Gram-positive bacteria:Staphylococcus aureus 29213 (MIC=125-500 µg/ml), Strepococcus faecalis (MIC>500 µg/ml).Yeast:Candida albicans 14053 (MIC=250-500 µg/ml).
